name: MecoFun
description: Meco.Fun is a SocialFi platform that transforms social engagement into on-chain value. Users can post memes, share short videos, interact with content, collect NFTs, gain points, and convert points into $MECO tokens. Meco brings the fun of Web2 virality together with Web3 ownership and rewards. Built on Soneium and Base, Meco enables high-speed interactions, zero-gas user experience, and a scalable creator economy powered entirely by community activity.
